info.abstract:
The Tutor Transcript Evaluation component gives users the OpenAI's evaluation to the transcript of tutoring session. We are using OpenAI gpt-3.5-turb-instruct engine.
See demo workflow.
info.description: This component gives users the OpenAI's evaluation to the transcript of tutoring session.

ul.li: Transcript of tutoring session. Transcript can be in VTT, CSV or text format. Zipped multiple transcripts can be used. Required

GPT prompt in plain text format. This text string must be included in the prompt file: "Transcript Start --- --- Transcript End." Not Required. Sample prompts: filter prompt at session level, evaluation at session level, evaluation by line
The CSV file that has OpenAI's responses.
OpenAI API Key: Obtain your API key from OpenAI's website.
Transcript File Type: Select from the following options: Zip of VTT Files, Zip of CSV Files, Zip of TXT Files, Single VTT, Single CSV, or Single TXT.
CSV Utterance Column: Visible only when the file type is Zip of CSV Files or Single CSV. Use this to specify which column contains the session's utterances.
Number of Trials: Number of times GPT will be queried with the same transcript.
Max Tokens: Maximum number of tokens allowed in GPT's response.
GPT Temperature: A value between 0 and 1; lower values make the output more focused and deterministic.
Compose Prompt Now: When checked, you are required to enter your own prompt in the Prompt field. If left unchecked, prompt must be imported as a file, see the Inputs section above.

Prompt: Only available if the checkbox of Compose Prompt Now is checked. The text "Transcript Start --- --- Transcript End." is required to be included in the field. Non ACSII characters are not allowed in this field, so you must clean them up before the component can run.
